titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.
A bill to reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-234.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 389.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to reauthorize for FY2018-FY2024 the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Fund Grant Program.
